pullRequest.body:
A lower mixin type class can lead to surprisingly heavy typeclass searches. This PR attempts to add shortcuts for SMul and see the effect on performance. Try stronger type classes first so that it doesn't always need to search the entire algebraic typeclass hierarchy.

---
<!-- The text above the `---` will become the commit message when your
PR is merged. Please leave a blank newline before the `---`, otherwise
GitHub will format the text above it as a title.

For details on the "pull request lifecycle" in mathlib, please see:
https://leanprover-community.github.io/contribute/index.html

In particular, note that most reviewers will only notice your PR
if it passes the continuous integration checks.
Please ask for help on https://leanprover.zulipchat.com if needed.

To indicate co-authors, include lines at the bottom of the commit message
(that is, before the `---`) using the following format:

Co-authored-by: Author Name <author@email.com>

If you are moving or deleting declarations, please include these lines at the bottom of the commit message
(that is, before the `---`) using the following format:

Moves:
- Vector.* -> Mathlib.Vector.*
- ...

Deletions:
- Nat.bit1_add_bit1
- ...

Any other comments you want to keep out of the PR commit should go
below the `---`, and placed outside this HTML comment, or else they
will be invisible to reviewers.

If this PR depends on other PRs, please list them below this comment,
using the following format:
- [ ] depends on: #abc [optional extra text]
- [ ] depends on: #xyz [optional extra text]

-->

This is #13690 without dependencies. Let's see if this works well.

Maybe in the future we can use the solution in #16486 and avoid the slowdown.

[![Open in Gitpod](https://gitpod.io/button/open-in-gitpod.svg)](https://gitpod.io/from-referrer/)

### PR summary [35303f8bb7](https://github.com/leanprover-community/mathlib4/pull/16607/commits/35303f8bb79d235b7f0d9103e262d34468fd9428)

<details><summary>

#### Import changes for modified files

</summary>

Dependency changes

| File | Base Count | Head Count | Change |
| --- | --- | --- | --- |
| Mathlib.Algebra.Field.Subfield | 647 | 599 | -48 (-7.42%) |


<details><summary>Import changes for all files</summary>

|Files|Import difference|
|-|-|
| `Mathlib.Algebra.Field.Subfield`|-48|
| `Mathlib.Algebra.Order.Field.Subfield`|-37|

</details>

</details>

---

#### Declarations diff

`+ Module.instSMul`
<details>
  <summary>You can run this locally as follows</summary>


```bash
## summary with just the declaration names:
./scripts/declarations_diff.sh <optional_commit>

## more verbose report:
./scripts/declarations_diff.sh long <optional_commit>
```
</details>

The doc-module for `script/declarations_diff.sh` contains some details about this script.

Here are the [benchmark results](http://speed.lean-fro.org/mathlib4/run-detail/c929240a-98f8-4751-9941-ac3a0a57be61) for commit 5be54b39de840d8c6570fe7ff0c359fc44be94e8.Found no runs to compare against.

Here are the [benchmark results](http://speed.lean-fro.org/mathlib4/run-detail/ec54ed23-3615-4a04-841e-d4fa875a83c5) for commit 35303f8bb79d235b7f0d9103e262d34468fd9428.
There were [significant changes](http://speed.lean-fro.org/mathlib4/compare/0d55fbaf-67e3-4c4e-8bd2-587dc32591b1/to/ec54ed23-3615-4a04-841e-d4fa875a83c5) against commit 2eb00cae7edccf4e54238db2cb4b0a7dff59fbdd:
```diff
  Benchmark                                                               Metric         Change
  =============================================================================================
+ ~Mathlib.Algebra.Algebra.NonUnitalSubalgebra                            instructions   -21.5%
+ ~Mathlib.Algebra.Algebra.Quasispectrum                                  instructions   -13.3%
+ ~Mathlib.Algebra.Category.ModuleCat.ChangeOfRings                       instructions   -34.2%
+ ~Mathlib.Algebra.Category.ModuleCat.Presheaf                            instructions   -14.5%
+ ~Mathlib.Algebra.DualNumber                                             instructions   -29.7%
+ ~Mathlib.Algebra.Homology.HomotopyCategory.HomComplexShift              instructions   -12.2%

+ ~Mathlib.Algebra.Homology.ShortComplex.Linear                           instructions   -27.4%
+ ~Mathlib.Algebra.Module.LocalizedModule                                 instructions   -10.8%
+ ~Mathlib.Algebra.Order.Module.Defs                                      instructions   -13.8%
+ ~Mathlib.Algebra.Polynomial.Module.AEval                                instructions   -24.1%
+ ~Mathlib.Algebra.Polynomial.Module.Basic                                instructions   -16.4%
+ ~Mathlib.Algebra.Ring.CentroidHom                                       instructions   -16.0%
+ ~Mathlib.Algebra.Star.NonUnitalSubalgebra                               instructions   -13.0%
+ ~Mathlib.Algebra.TrivSqZeroExt                                          instructions   -32.0%
+ ~Mathlib.Analysis.Analytic.Basic                                        instructions    -6.8%
+ ~Mathlib.Analysis.Analytic.Composition                                  instructions    -7.5%
+ ~Mathlib.Analysis.CStarAlgebra.ContinuousFunctionalCalculus.Instances   instructions    -5.5%
+ ~Mathlib.Analysis.CStarAlgebra.ContinuousFunctionalCalculus.NonUnital   instructions   -13.6%
+ ~Mathlib.Analysis.CStarAlgebra.Multiplier                               instructions   -21.6%
+ ~Mathlib.Analysis.CStarAlgebra.Spectrum                                 instructions   -11.9%
+ ~Mathlib.Analysis.Calculus.ContDiff.Basic                               instructions    -7.9%
+ ~Mathlib.Analysis.Calculus.ContDiff.Defs                                instructions    -5.5%
+ ~Mathlib.Analysis.Calculus.Deriv.Comp                                   instructions   -15.1%
+ ~Mathlib.Analysis.Calculus.FDeriv.Mul                                   instructions    -4.1%
+ ~Mathlib.Analysis.Calculus.FormalMultilinearSeries                      instructions   -19.7%
+ ~Mathlib.Analysis.Convex.Basic                                          instructions   -19.6%
+ ~Mathlib.Analysis.Convex.Between                                        instructions    -7.3%
+ ~Mathlib.Analysis.Convex.Combination                                    instructions    -9.9%
+ ~Mathlib.Analysis.Convex.Function                                       instructions   -21.4%
+ ~Mathlib.Analysis.Convex.Jensen                                         instructions   -21.0%
+ ~Mathlib.Analysis.Convex.Mul                                            instructions   -27.2%
+ ~Mathlib.Analysis.Convex.Segment                                        instructions   -15.1%
+ ~Mathlib.Analysis.Distribution.SchwartzSpace                            instructions   -12.1%
+ ~Mathlib.Analysis.Fourier.FourierTransformDeriv                         instructions    -4.2%
+ ~Mathlib.Analysis.InnerProductSpace.Basic                               instructions    -4.2%
+ ~Mathlib.Analysis.LocallyConvex.WithSeminorms                           instructions   -17.0%
+ ~Mathlib.Analysis.Normed.Algebra.TrivSqZeroExt                          instructions   -30.3%
+ ~Mathlib.Analysis.Normed.Algebra.Unitization                            instructions   -18.9%
+ ~Mathlib.Analysis.Normed.Lp.lpSpace                                     instructions    -4.8%
+ ~Mathlib.Analysis.NormedSpace.Multilinear.Basic                         instructions    -5.2%
+ ~Mathlib.Analysis.NormedSpace.OperatorNorm.Mul                          instructions   -16.3%
+ ~Mathlib.Analysis.Seminorm                                              instructions   -18.3%
+ ~Mathlib.Analysis.SpecialFunctions.ContinuousFunctionalCalculus.Rpow    instructions    -6.7%
+ ~Mathlib.LinearAlgebra.BilinearMap                                      instructions   -29.4%
+ ~Mathlib.LinearAlgebra.Dual                                             instructions    -5.6%
+ ~Mathlib.LinearAlgebra.Matrix.SesquilinearForm                          instructions   -14.9%
+ ~Mathlib.LinearAlgebra.QuadraticForm.Basic                              instructions    -9.1%
+ ~Mathlib.LinearAlgebra.QuadraticForm.TensorProduct                      instructions   -10.4%
+ ~Mathlib.LinearAlgebra.TensorProduct.Basic                              instructions    -6.3%
+ ~Mathlib.LinearAlgebra.TensorProduct.Tower                              instructions   -40.7%
+ ~Mathlib.MeasureTheory.Integral.Bochner                                 instructions   -13.2%
+ ~Mathlib.RingTheory.Derivation.Basic                                    instructions   -11.7%
+ ~Mathlib.RingTheory.IsTensorProduct                                     instructions   -17.6%
+ ~Mathlib.RingTheory.Kaehler.Basic                                       instructions    -9.2%
- ~Mathlib.RingTheory.Kaehler.Polynomial                                  instructions   374.0%
+ ~Mathlib.RingTheory.TensorProduct.Basic                                 instructions    -8.9%
+ ~Mathlib.Topology.Algebra.Module.Basic                                  instructions   -11.8%
+ ~Mathlib.Topology.Algebra.Module.FiniteDimension                        instructions   -17.8%
+ ~Mathlib.Topology.Algebra.Module.Multilinear.Topology                   instructions   -19.6%
+ ~Mathlib.Topology.Algebra.Module.StrongTopology                         instructions   -14.4%
```

There should be an easy fix
to Kaehler Poly. I'll take a look tomorrow.

pullRequest.title: perf: change instance priority of `SMul`

source.title: Improving the performance of typeclass inference
